Package com.zanderwohl.chunks.Gamelogic

Interface IGameLogic

All Known Implementing Classes:
BadGame
public interface IGameLogic
Game logic interface - each game must provide these methods.

  • Method Summary

    • cleanup

      void cleanup()
      Perform any actions to free memory, save settings and files, etc. Will be called by the framework when the game closes or crashes.
